channel.description: Recent content in content-discovery on Empty

item.title: Parameter discovery tools comparison
item.description: Some people asked me about publishing a comparison between x8 and other major tools for parameter discovery: Arjun and Param Miner, so here it is! Parameter discovery tools help to find parameters that can be vulnerable or able to reveal some hidden features. In this post, I am going to check the speed and accuracy of these tools. For tests, I used a wordlist with 26k parameters. If you don’t have time to read the whole post - you can go directly to the summary at the end of a page.
